column5: I'm not sure how to phrase this at all but I'd figured I'd give it a shot. The pain you have will likely stay with you for the rest of your life. It will still burn until the day you die but you might be able to alleviate it. I recommend holding on to the memory of your girlfriend, as I know you will, despite people saying move on. If it helps I think you need to find a purpose and/or someway for you to let her live on with you in life. I do not know how but maybe try being a light for others like she was for you. This is difficult, and you might need to force yourself to but I think in the end you will get some semblance of peace. I hope this helped, sorry about her she sounds amazing.
